Name: Loss of the lysosomal lipid flippase ATP10B leads to progressive dopaminergic neurodegeneration and parkinsonian motor deficits.
Acknowledgements: We thank Annelies Aertgeerts, Kristel Vennekens and Joris Van Asselberghs for their technical assistance and the Leuven Viral Vector Core (LVVC) for the rAAV vector production. We acknowledge the VIB Bioimaging Core for the use of the confocal microscope and technical assistance. The authors would like to thank the staff of the clinical radiopharmacy at UZ Leuven for supply of [18F]-FE-PE2I, and Ms. Kasia Błażejczyk for technical support during some of the in vivo imaging assays.
